SEARCH
Module sc2002.scmb.grp1.hms
Package controller

Class PharmacistController

java.lang.Object
controller.PharmacistController
All Implemented Interfaces:
InventoryManagement, ReplenishmentRequestService
public class PharmacistController extends Object implements InventoryManagement, ReplenishmentRequestService
The PharmacistController class manages inventory and replenishment requests for medications. It implements both the InventoryManagement and ReplenishmentRequestService interfaces, allowing a pharmacist to check inventory, view low-stock alerts, and submit replenishment requests.

    • submitReplenishmentRequest

      public void submitReplenishmentRequest(String medicationName) throws IOException
      Submits a replenishment request for a specified medication, prompting the user to specify the quantity to be replenished. Provides validation for quantity input.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while saving the replenishment request
